overview: When young genius Felix Brainiac teams up with his time-traveling dinosaur pal Big T, the duo sets out on an amazing adventure, going where no kid and dino have gone before! Kid Brainiac Season 2  will take kids on a wonderful adventure discovering cool reptiles, far-away galaxies, our amazing solar system and even the tiny world that can only be seen with a microscope!
title: Kid Brainiac Season 2
